attributes.action: Tony Foulds from Sheffield tends USA Air Force memorial, have Him Knighted
attributes.background: 8 year old lad who saw the plane crash and has tended to the memorial for 66 years every day with out support

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
